name: Circle Drops
description:
Simply get the shapes through the holes. Switch quickly between the circle and the x shapes as they fall towards you. Try to keep up with this addictive game as it gets faster and faster.

Single mode too easy for you? Try the dual mode where you have to manage two separate holes in this fast paced endless puzzle game.

Featuring:
* Leaderboards
* Share your score with friends
* Dual Mode

What is your best score?
